DOC.brief_title: Open Versus Robotic Retromuscular Ventral Hernia Repair
DOC.detailed_description: All patient present Greenville Health System Hernia Center meet inclusion criterion consider enrollment . Patients qualify agree participate randomize 1:1 robotic retromuscular ventral hernia repair open retromuscular ventral hernia repair . Data collect include following : demographic information , medical characteristic , medication , medical surgical history , operative detail , hospital stay data , patient-reported outcome via quality life questionnaire . Post-operative follow-up occur 2 week , 6 week , 6 month , 1 year 2 year .
DOC.criteria: Ventral incisional hernia measure ≥ 7 cm ≤ 15 cm . At least one follow risk factor : Body Mass Index > 30 , Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease , Diabetes Mellitus , current smoker ( within 1 month ) Current abdominal wall infection Presence ileostomy , colostomy , ileal conduit Center Disease Control wind class 3 4 Hernia defect < 7 cm > 15 cm Pregnant woman
